snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include a humorous comparison of Silicon Valley and kindergarten, a look at concentrated industries like the wireless...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include a humorous comparison of Silicon Valley and kindergarten, a look at concentrated industries like the wireless business and the patterns of reaction to big news on social media.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot:  Twitter TV and New Google Stores
